General.Name: Kunshan Asia Aroma Corp. Ltd.
General.Description: Kunshan Asia Aroma Corp., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of spices and food additives in China. It offers flavor ingredients, which include natural isobutyl phenylacetate, NAT.Benzaldehyde, natural allyl heptanoate, and natural aldehyde; fragrance ingredients; and cooling agents. Its products are used in various industries such as food, tobacco, daily chemicals, medicine, feed, cosmetics, textiles, and leather. The company also exports its products to the United States, Japan, Europe, and internationally. Kunshan Asia Aroma Corp., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Kunshan, China.
General.Address: No.269 Middle Wen Pu Road, Kunshan, China, 215341
